website_summaries.verdict: An entry-level screen from a highly regarded manufacturer, this product has many perks and a few known flaws.
cons: Some complaints about screen durability, ripples, and sagging

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product and even worse seller!! The screen just wouldn't work once installed and i immediately raised a return request. I called the person on the number that was printed on the return label and he didn't even have a clue about the RA reference number i gave him. Moreover he was extremely rude and was asking me why the product isn't working as if i was technical expert on the matter. And why should i be paying for returning a defective piece of equipment?!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Elite Screens don't fulfill its warranty!
customer_reviews.text: We use it less than a few times and the gear is not working any more. Elite Screens will not honor the warranty. Stay away with companies that don't fulfill their commitments.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Crooked screen would not retract.
customer_reviews.text: Mt previous Elite Screen was high quality but had a few scratches from years of use. I thought that this would be a great replacement but the screen protruded crooked and would not retract fully. Looks like I'm stuck with my old screen. I don't feel confident enough to purchase again because this seems like an issue that can easily pop up with a different screen. The quality has really dropped with Elite Screens.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but needed a wireless remote
customer_reviews.text: This screen looks and operates great but I didn't care for the long cord and inline up/down/stop switch. I replaced the inline switch with a wireless controller found here:  The pictures above are how I wired it. More details on the other items page. The 15 dollar wireless controller works awesome. I don't understand why Elite doesn't just add it for free. Other than the switch, it is a great screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: A good buy with some issues to share.
customer_reviews.text: The good - true 180 degree viewing angle. Good 4k picture when accompanying the epson 4010 4k projector. motorized screen is smooth and works well, integrates with my universal remote. The bad - screen curled quite a bit on both edges. unclear how to resolve after talking with company. does alter the picture on the edges. Also, the screen travels about 2" further than advertised. Created an issue for my screen placement. To make the necessary adjustment, the screen has to come off the wall. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Accoustically transparent screen is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm specifically reviewing the 125" accoustically transparent screen. It is a fabric screen. And I immediately noticed an improvement in picture quality over my 100" that was made of a PVC vinyl type material. It really seems to catch the light better and it almost looks like an illuminated TV in comparison. So not only can you put your speakers behind the screen for more realistic sound placement. But it catches the light and colors even better than PVC. Big thumbs up to this amazing screen. I've provided a few pictures.
customer_reviews.author: E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen that does it all!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything but wonderful things! The price is just right and it functions GREAT! It came with a wireless remote, a wired remote as well as a 12v trigger for a projector (all work great). We did the 12v trigger which requires a 3.5mm MONO cable that connects to the projector. After having a bit of trouble, we contacted Elite customer support and they responded immediately with help. The instructions warn of using this specific screen with a short throw projector. We are filling the entire screen up from about 3 feet and it looks GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.author: B. Phil Howell

customer_reviews.title: Cannot understand the bad reviews - this is FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m just really lucky, or not particularly ready to give up on something. This screen is AWESOME. Seriously. Who cares if it takes all of 15 seconds to deploy. You ever try to get a manual screen to set up correctly in under 15 seconds ? This thing worked right out of the box. No wrinkles, no edge curl of notice, no smell, nothing but smoothe operation and cinematic awesomeness. Pair this screen with a new 4K projector, and your life will never be the same. I tried it with my video game console, Sunday football, and my set top box (I.d. Steaming audio and video). All routed through a 4K HDMI switch. Flawless. Awesome. Get this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!! Bent and sides are rolled
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the screen today, well I have received it. The box looked like it was in tact, however, when I pulled it out..... There were dents, bends in more than one location. I have tried to get the bend in the middle off to at least hang it on the wall, after hanging it up, i have used the remote to open it. The sides were all rolled up.... I am hoping that if it stays open for few days the sides will straighten out. I feel completely ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Speedo76

customer_reviews.title: Screen was great, install was easy
customer_reviews.text: Screen was great, install was easy. We hung it off the wall because I have a pitched internal ceiling. Some folks talked about the ripples or the smell in reviews when I was looking for various screens and I have to say that I'm quite happy with it. It didn't have any ripples and while it did have the "factory new" smell for a few days, I just left it extended to air out. After 3 days it was fine. The projector I tested with was an OLD projector that used to be in a school and is more for powerpoints. I just ordered a new BenQ 2050 and it should be in any day! cant wait!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shimatzki

customer_reviews.title: The thick wire hanging next to the screen is very annoying!
customer_reviews.text: We like the screen and picture quality. But this thick wire hanging on the side of the screen is extremely annoying and poorly designed. They could have kept it in the middle for buyers to hide it behind the screen. Doesn’t even come with a remote. Frustrating that the remote is sold separately and is over priced!! Would go for a different one if I didn’t have to go through the entire unhooking and return process!
customer_reviews.author: ZAUREZ MALIK

customer_reviews.title: Very wavy and sounds like a haunted house elevator
customer_reviews.text: After about 30 days I've noticed that the screen is rumpled and wavy at the bottom... and big waves across the center. The worst part is when you are watching a sports ticker... at the bottom the words are rolling up and down as they cross the waves. For almost $200 I sort of expected it to last longer than 30 days... Update: even worse after 4 months... All panning footage is completely ruined by the waviness. In addition, the noise it make going up and down sounds more like an elevator in a horror movie than a quality piece of A/V equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting screen drop voids warranty
customer_reviews.text: The screen and housing is great. Extends automatically with the 12v trigger at about the same time my projector powers on. What I have an issue with is that the screen drop adjustment is under a "Void warranty if removed" sticker. This is a very basic function and if you need to void your own 2/3 year warranty to use it, maybe the product design needs some work?
customer_reviews.author: Caarrl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture, VERY easy to install, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely intimidated upon receiving the box for this projection screen. I had no idea how I was going to manage to hang it, and it sat in the box for MONTHS. Finally, I opened it and found that they actually made it incredibly easy to suspend this from beams. The support brackets can easily slide to the side so you don't have to get your anchor placement perfect, I got some chain from Home Depot... bam... super quick and easy, you just need a couple ladders and another able body to help just because of the size. As for the picture quality, it's fantastic and considering it's motorized as well I think it's an incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Kronk

customer_reviews.title: Really NICE projector screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector screen completes my home theater setup!! Took about a week to arrive but finally got it mounted and ready for viewing. Came with a set of ceiling mount which was fairly easy to install. There was no sign of light bleeding or wrinkles/curls, just wished it came with a remote. It'll be paired with my new Epson 3800 4k projector. Overall, very satisfied with the qaulity!!!
customer_reviews.author: psx

customer_reviews.title: Missing essential parts!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great out of the box. This screen doesn't weigh a whole bunch either. Too bad I don't have the Infrared (IR) remote control...... or the Detachable 3-way wall UP/STOP/DOWN switch....... or the Built-in 5-12 volt trigger port.......... OR the 12 Volt Trigger Cable. I can't use it because all these parts that I just mentioned are not included. I spent money on something I cannot use. Very unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Works OK but you really do get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a motorized screen for a budget minded client, so gave the Elite Screens Spectrum a go. Ended up working out OK, but the thing is pretty cheaply made. Takes a painfully long time for the screen to fully deploy, and the RJ-45 socket for the relay control would not reliably hold the connector. Biggest gripe is, and again this was a budget driven purchase so keep some perspective, because the screen does not use tab tension-ing to keep the screen sides tight, the screen material tends to curl in on itself as it drops...not enough to really affect the picture but it is kinda cheesy. In fact, that's how I would describe this screen; effective but rather cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: be real careful as amazon shipped this screen defected for the 4th time
customer_reviews.text: updated 5/1/15 the worst customer service experience i have ever encounter, 4 times this product was returned with missing parts, one of the previews screens was also returned and i recognized it. when i called the supervisor said that she could give me 24 cents discount for the next purchase lol thats what she said. i just feel like i have rip-off It makes some noise and had a tini little scratch right side of the s 3.26.15 i had to return this as the motor stop working and is curling big time. 3.31.15 i. got my replacement and its even worst. curling and it has a whole palm and shoe print in the back of it. very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the motorized screen to replace a regular screen I had purchased a couple of years ago. I wanted the ease of rolling the screen down when I wanted it and then back up when not being used. I mounted it using the optional 12" wall brackets. One person install, less than 20 minutes from the time I opened the box until I was rolling it down to test with my projector. It was ready to go. This screen does just what it is supposed to. Easy power down and easy power back up. It stops at all the way down and all the way up, or I can press the stop button anywhere in between.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J

customer_reviews.title: wrinkled screen
customer_reviews.text: bought but couldn't install it due to office still under construction, we finally install it and the screen is wrinkled, try to replace it with another one but its past the return time frame policy so I'm stuck with a bad out of the box product. what about product warranty? no info on that one, unless you buy 2 or 3 year protection, you will think the product has at least 1 year manufactures warranty, no number to contact Amazon or the manufacturer TOTAL RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Garbriel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mostly
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an absolutely flat screen. The tab tension screen is good but not great. There are visible sags for lack of a better term. Also the remote seems to be weak. It takes several clicks before the screen reacts. With this said the image is great and rarely do these issues show. I am not sure if I would buy tab tensioned again because of the increase in cost but this may be much better than the non-tab tensioned.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is perfect. The operation or unrolling/rolling is smooth. The screen is balanced and straight due to being perfectly weighted at the bottom. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: valentino775

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the screen today. Installed it on my own, really is a two person job unless you are a savvy installer. I bought this to replace a smaller fixed frame, wall mounted screen. Once I get the projector distance measured and installed I will update review. Update, project is installed and dialed in, simply outstanding, this screen has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great screen!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several of screens before finding the right match for me. Here is what I can tell you about this model. The white case is very elegant looking, and made very well. As for the screen itself, I couldn't have asked for a better quality screen. The screen is dead flat, with no wrinkles, or waves to speak about. The tab tensioning on this works very, very well. I highly recommend this screen to anyone who has any doubt about dealing with waves. The only thing that I wish this model would have offered would have been to have a 106", or 110" version. Other than this, I am very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HAMES

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality elite spectrum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon warehouse and it said very good condition, not!!!, as you can see in the photos it's stuck in the down position and I had to bend the ends to mount on rack I can move it little at a time so I can watch a movie. Amazon wants me to send it back but I don't have a box and it would get more messed up to send it back They should give me my refund right of way so I can get a different one. They are wasting my time
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great screen. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great screen. Easy to install. Ending up buying toggle bolts. Just didn't think the provided anchors were study enough. No wrinkles and haven't experienced any smells like some have. I would give it 5 stars if it came with remote. It really should. Don't understand that the Spectum 1 does for less money. Ok, so you have to buy the remote...but for $175.00? What a joke! The wireless remote comes with a lot of options, like a wall switch, and two remotes...but let me buy the receiver and 1 remote! Might try some third party remotes that you can buy for about $20.
customer_reviews.author: AlVacado

customer_reviews.title: it is a Wow big screen when play Game !!
customer_reviews.text: it perform very well , big enough for playing game and watch movie. a Wow to everyone after setup. motorized up/down sync with my projector, w/o any connection or installation ceiling hang well and fabric is flat. image is well better then projection onto wall before missing some screw per manual said for wall mount,, but no big deal, since I am ceiling hang it. overall is good. will recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Momo2

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this screen
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this screen with an Epson 5050ub projector and the picture is amazing. The screen has an extra remote that plugs into the projector and it raises and lowers automatically when the power is turned on and off. There are wrinkles in the black on the bottom of the screen but they they don't effect the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: jeremey still

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: This is my first in home theater setup. I've done a lot of research and sat through a few demos with some reputable companies & I decided to go cheap because my budget changed during the holidays. The tension technology almost ensures zero wrinkles & waves. The motor is super quiet. I have this paired with a Epson 2045 & I must say that my picture quality is better than the $3000 setup they had in the BestBuy demo room.
customer_reviews.author: phillylive215

customer_reviews.title: Cant get reply to issues were having with projector screen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our small church worked well for a month, being used one up cycle one down cycle every Sunday and once on Wednesday, then it developed a mind of it's on coming all the way down and motor continues running cant control with remote or via control pad had to unplug screen to prevent it from running. Plugged back in selected up, it went up and wont shutoff had to unplug.now we are left with the screen down whole service, which is hiding part of stage area. Tried emailing and contacting seller with no response to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Laprade

customer_reviews.title: No Wireless remote comes with screen
customer_reviews.text: I thought product cam with remote but found out after that it was a add on option for quite a bit more. The screen quality is good this is my 3rd Elite screen purchased and the quality is by far the best i have used. All the other screens I had came with remote and however just no this model only comes with remote on the cord with is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Grose

customer_reviews.title: Beware- Don’t Buy the unit based on the product description and content listed
customer_reviews.text: Do not fall into the trap. The product description is misleading. This screen doesn’t come with a remote or a 12v trigger to wirelessly sync the screen to the projector. The seller will force you to buy a seperate kit for wireless control of the unit. Worst customer service experience with seller not accepting the misleading description as their fault.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great - BUT
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my home theater and it was fantastic. However over the past month or so the gears inside started becoming increasingly noisy. Now its a ear aching rattle and roll. Build quality seems to be B stock and can be hit or miss i suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: It works, not sure if Id spend money for the electric motor one...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Love it! Don't know if I would have spent more money on the electric motor one though since I never role it up or down. It just stays in the down position the whole time. I thought I would have used the motor more often, but I don't. But the motor does work great! the screen is a awesome brilliant white and adds way more clarity and contrast to the picture! The screen won't make your projector image better, that's just projectors... but it does make it a bit brighter... But not much. It definitely makes the picture smooth and flat unlike if you had textured wall you were once using like I was. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Other than it going up and down pretty slow, the screen is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We use this projector at least once a week at my work. Other than it going up and down pretty slow, the screen is amazing. It has been incredibly durable, it was not hard to install and it is quite impressive to roll up and down when you bring clients in the tour the building. The multiple remotes it comes with is easy to use and they all function properly. They have about a 30-40 ft distance to be able to click the button and have the screen move. I enjoy it so much I often just press the button to make it go up and down just for the plain satisfaction of owning this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product but take some time to plan your install
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It runs pretty quietly the mounting brackets could be better. It’s quite heavy so needs to be mounted into wall studs or ceiling joists for safety. That limits how it can be installed. You need a little planning to make sure you can install this where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: A Farser

customer_reviews.title: 12v trigger works great with the optoma gt1080 projector and is able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Currently the only problem that i have with this screen is that the manufacturer on amazon didn't include information that drop down electric screen visually show waves in the screen with a short throw projector. If I would have known, I would have gotten a different screen or a different projector, but the waves may diminish over time I hope. 12v trigger works great with the optoma gt1080 projector and is able to function properly as long as you know how to make your own cable to splice into the projector since its a 3.5mm jack. overall, a very descent screen.
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: I really like the screen. It fits perfect, comes down straight and has no flaws in the material that I can see. I like that you just have to hit the up or down button once without having to sit there and hold it and it auto senses when to stop. The only thing that makes me laugh is how slow it extends and retracts. You can hit the button and then literally go make a cup of coffee before its finished. We honestly don't close it very often so not a big deal and the motor is fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great screen at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have this screen mounted in my living room and use it as our main way to watch television. The quality of the picture on the screen is superb and the price was great for what you get. I also have this screen wired to the 12v trigger on my projector and it works perfectly. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Retraction speeds are a little slower than expected, but nothing unreasonable. The projector still takes longer to warm up. Operation is quiet and the mounting options are flexible. I'm using four screws to mount it directly into a beam on my ceiling. The only bad part is how cheap the remote feels. I wish it appeared as tough and quality as the product itself, but it gets the job done well. The edges curve towards the front only about a cm or so, and the image reflection is nothing short of excellent. I hope it lasts years!
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, rigid screen, with great blackout edges.
customer_reviews.text: The screen isn't too heavy, and moves up and down smoothly. It has a toughness to it, like it's not going to tear, and the black borders are great, so it doesn't get in the way of the video. The movies on the screen look amazing. i was expecting to not be able to see it during daytime, since i don't have blackout curtains, but the video still looks great on this screen! Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Knox

customer_reviews.title: Screen worked perfectly.  No wrinkles even with first use.
customer_reviews.text: Screen worked perfectly. No wrinkles even with first use. I had seen the few negative reviews with problems with screen wrinkling, but seemed to be a recurrent theme with all retractable screens. There was a little edge wrinkling/curling but does not seem to affect the viewing area. II figured I could spend a lot for wrinkles or a little for wrinkles so I opted for the Elite Screens Electric 100H. I wasn't sure I wanted powered or not, but opted for the cool factor of remote control for up and down. I also figured it would put less strain against the mounting surface. Now if the motor lasts it will be a real win,
customer_reviews.author: Robert Muller

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: The screen is great value for money. The construction seems strong and the acoustics through the screen are great. If I had to say what the opportunities are - The motor is slightly loud and the shipping company was effective but a little difficult to communicate with or schedule with.
customer_reviews.author: Gopal Rangaswamy

customer_reviews.title: This screen is amazing. The shipping company was great about contacting me ...
customer_reviews.text: This screen is amazing. The shipping company was great about contacting me and setting up delivery. This is a large package. It arrived and was packed in a box with somewhat good protection. The screen was not damaged and looked good. I was surprised that the screen was the measurements they claimed but the housing that holds the screen is almost 3-4 inches longer total. It was a tight fit for me as I was expecting a certain size. However once it was mounted I was amazed at how quiet this screen is and it looks amazing this is a super price and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: motorized is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: fantastic screen! I use this with a viewsonic projector and i am very very happy with the way it looks even with the lights on! i always order motorized screens because the casing is much stronger and have fewer wrinkles than the manual pull down ones get during the shipping process. i had a friend order same brand but wanted to save some money so he got the manual pull down. He was very disappointed in the amount of difference in the wrinkles.Spend the extra money and get the motorized version.
customer_reviews.author: zarzo

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an all-around great product. It’s made my home theater very popular with everyone. It’s not difficult to install and works just as they promised it will. It’s motorized and has a remote which is really wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd Degree Serious

customer_reviews.title: very nice, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: We love the screen. We use it for worship service at our church. It is a good size for everyone to be able to read the words, and the operation is smooth and quiet. From the very first, the screen opened with no wrinkles and lays nice and flat. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Talich

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen
customer_reviews.text: This was my first motorized projection screen purchase. The screen looks awesome. I can't really complain. My only negative thing about it was the packaging. When I saw the box I immediately noticed that it was crushed and slightly torn. The Fedex driver had me inspect the screen before he left . I opened it and noticed a small dent on the metal housing that the screen rolls up into. Fortunately it didn't affect the screen itself . Other than that I'm pleased with this screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. We used to project to a blank wall, but this screen makes the picture so much brighter and sharper! We basically have a 125” hdtv now. Such a good purchase and necessary if you want a great projection experience! I love that the screen goes up-and-down flawlessly. I bought the tab-tensioned screen, and I highly recommend it. No wrinkles or curling right out of the box. The 125” screen is massive!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good motorized screen
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Elite Screens device because it supported IR. Works great with my Harmony remote after re-teaching the Harmony all of the IR commands. We use it daily to watch late night TV before bed. We hear some rattling when the projector is in motion. Overall, we are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Troy R Heffern

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Screen arrived with deep folds that are impossible to take out and affect picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chapa

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 150-inch Diagonal 16:9, Electric Motorized 4K/8K screen for less than $500 and it is worth every penny in quality and performance. As other reviewers have pointed out, the ends do curl and there are some minor waves that are hardly noticeable to me. The wireless remote is a great feature and allows you to stop the screen at any length you desire. The screen thus far has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McLain

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We built a new theater. We had limited space so had to put the speakers behind the screen. We mounted the screen above the ceiling. I set the harmony remote to lower the screen while the projector warms up. It's pretty cool and the picture on this screen looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: One year later. No problems.
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year now. Less than a couple hundred bucks and how great this screen has been... couldn't be happier. Had zero problems so far. We have a small space and the screen goes up and down in front of our main window. Bright sunlight during the day and a huge screen at night, with the touch of a button. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen
customer_reviews.text: Dude for the price this screen is sick. Don’t waste your time on the super expensive ones. This is our second one and this one is even better than the first. 100 plus inch one.
customer_reviews.author: ElTalento

customer_reviews.title: Big Screen
customer_reviews.text: We needed a really large screen for viewing text from over 60 feet away and this screen meets the need. It was fairly easy to install, in point of fact ours was put up by one person in less than an hour. The screen extends and retracts silently and smoothly by pushlng of a button on the remote control. Projections on the screen appear crisp and clear. We are very satisfied with product. UPDATE: Sep 2018, we have had this screen for nearly 5 years and it still works great and we are still very satisfied with it. Have not had a single problem with it. Still a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D. Dauer

customer_reviews.title: Screen motor lasted about 2 1/2 years before it wore out.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality screen, quiet motor worked well with the optional screen trigger I also purchased. Just disappointed the motor wore out after 2 1/2 years. I used it 2-3 times per week so maybe no more than 200-250 cycles on the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Used this thing for years without issue
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for a looooooong time (10+ years) and it's still working great. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Gerik Bensing

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great picture, can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research and wanted the best without breaking the bank. We knew a motorized was a must with 3 kids under 12 and with the size, quality and ratings Elite screens was the right choice. The installation went flawlessly and the HW is solid along with the frame, since we bought the 150” screen. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a quality screen at the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: both sides of screen curl in 1. 5 inches ...
customer_reviews.text: both sides of screen curl in 1.5 inches. i havnt connected my projector yet so impact isnt known . i have allowed the screen to hang in lowered position for a week with no change. i suspect the right side is warped enough to effect picture. emailed mfg over a month ago and havnt heard back. i will update this review at a later date
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks great, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: it was a snap to get this installed since we already had blocking in place. My only qualm is it is verrry slow to go up and down, but really can't complain for the price. Also note it's 16:10, so most content won't use the entire screen area.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but poor controller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material, quality and fast shipping but my only disgusted was the remote control, basically you must have to stand front the screen to put it down basically ... So why you need a remote control if you can not make motioned on distance.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great screen for the price. My first screen was damaged in shipping but a week later I had a replacement. I wish the motor was just a bit faster serves its purpose for the price, I built a custom box and mounted the screen inside, also mounted color changing LED's to light up the entire walls when the screen is not in use. Very happy with the outcome. This screen is massive so make sure you have a big enough room to sit at least 15' back.
customer_reviews.author: Andre' Petrus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screen!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent screen, the remote control is a little bit tricky (not sure if its the battery) but you have to like really position it much closer and in a certain way to pick up. But thats actually no big deal. I will highly recommend it anytime to a Buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Benhail C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home theatre
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a home theatre. We measured the space for the screen and looked at product reviews and recommendations. This screen is exactly as advertised. It fits our space and has a remote control drop down and reverse. If you really like movies and TV programs, you'll need a projector for the screen but this screen is very good and it makes 4K projection come alive.
customer_reviews.author: PAKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for inexpensive motorized screen.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a relatively inexpensive screen for my front projector. This one had good reviews so I bought it. Wish it came in white, but the black works. It has been a great screen. I don't use it a lot, but it works when I use it. I programmed my universal remote with the cheap remote that came with it. Screen is pretty flat. No bad waves or wrinkles distorting the picture. I hung from ceiling just below a drop ceiling. Hung myself. It was very easy. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, everytime.
customer_reviews.text: I got this alongside my new projector, setting it up was easy. Remote works great, the sides to bend in a little bit but over time they start to smooth out. overall picture quality is amazing, and being able to just have it automatically roll itself back up is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: motor out after 6 months?
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved the screen until today. I watched a movie and hit the button to retract the screen and nothing happened except for a clicking sound. The screen would not go up or down! I bought the elite screen May 5th, 2015 and have had no issues with it until now. I put in a request on Elite Screen's website so we shall see what happens. At least it is stuck in the down position. The screen itself is great. Projection shows up crisp, clear and in vibrant color.
customer_reviews.author: William Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: No creases on first use! Picture quality is great. The screen takes about 20 seconds to drop, but that’s about the time it takes for the projector to come on. Build quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mojica

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen, good value
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to mount and works well. It's not perfect in that it has a couple of very minor waves in the screen, but that are very minor, and I'm picky. I'm pleased with the screen and would buy the same screen again. I project TV and movies on it with my Epson 5030 UBe projector. But if you are looking for absolute perfection, you may want to shell out the big bucks and get a more expensive screen.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Screens great and does work with a semi short throw projector. Only Issue is you have to be on the left side for the remote to work.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected in this. Worked great. It's an excellent addition to our theater room. Would definitely buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dillweed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went through all the reviews and did our research. This screen rocks. You don’t need anything to anchor it to the wall, unless it’s going outside. Perfect for our basement. Easy install. Worth every penny to get the remote version.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: A good value screen for home theatre
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a modest upgrade to an older manual Elite screen. Most importantly, the advertised dimensions for the screen and case are exact - this can be critical if the screen is being used within existing entertainment centers. Construction seems solid. The screen hangs perfectly vertical without any waves or puckers. The screen surface reflects a bright and clear image. The ability to stop the screen at any point between fully retracted and fully extended is a vast improvement over a manual screen.
customer_reviews.author: Willard K.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking screen. Packaged well. Only thing I would like an improvement on it the speed of rolling up and down. It is extremely slow but it functions well.
customer_reviews.author: jwpark

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Do not have a inbuilt remote. add-on remote will be around $100. too much. just bought since i wanted 90" . Screen is not that great have waves at the bottom. non noticeable from far distance . Can see easily when no movie is running. OK for the price range. MaxWhite FG does not make any difference as customer supports told me that is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mansa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, great value!
customer_reviews.text: What a value! We love this power screen in our home entertainment room! Picture is great, easy to install ( with 2 people, it’s 8 ft long after all) the power up down is kinda slow. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: There is a fair mix of reviews that range between everything being ok, and horror stories. Luckily, mine arrived quickly, was easy to mount (with separate wall mounts purchased on Amazon), and worked like a charm the first time I hit the "down" button. The screen looks good, no curling or distortions. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Brown

customer_reviews.title: Curling after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in my living room with a BenQ HT1085ST for a year. The raising/lowering mechanism seems quite accurate and so far dependable though very slow. The problem is with the screen materials. The outer black edge has curled forward over 1 inch which causes warping at the edges of the image. I'm not looking forward to trying to get warrantee replacement based on other reviews I have read here.
customer_reviews.author: Al Bravo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new screen...it is such a quiet motor, you almost can't hear it! Very smooth operation as it goes up and down. I read reviews of the product stating that folks had bad luck with visible lines, or ripples from shipping/being rolled up. Not a single visible ripple or anything the very first time we used it. mounting with the included hardware was easy and fast. I am looking into purchasing another slightly larger one for the other side of our dining hall. The reviews were right about the initial plastic smell. But we left it rolled down for a couple of days and I don't even notice anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt afford the 10 X for the business and glad I didnt
customer_reviews.text: This is WELL wroth the $$.. I have a screen in my home that is 10 X what this costed.. Couldnt afford the 10 X for the business and glad I didnt.. this is PERFECT! If you're wanting a good quality screen for home or work, this is really a nice product! Quiet.. easy to install.. well designed with the remote too..
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Screen is OK, package damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's my 4th screen ordered from Amazon. It came damaged. Fortunately, the screen has only a small dent... I can live with it... but it's the 4th replacement already!!! I think that they should stop offering screens, as this is a really huge pain and hustle.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like how it goes up and down with the remote. I wish there was some form of mounting bracket also in the center as the unit bows in the center. I will epoxy a handmade bracket so I can support the center. The problem with no support in the center is that I can't get the waves out of the screen. The good thing is you can't see the waves in the screen while watching movies. I really like the black edge on the side and bottom. It gives the projection crisp edges and looks very professional.
customer_reviews.author: John White

customer_reviews.title: Love movies? Relive the motion picture over again with ELITE screens.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered without a scratch on the box, easy instructions. Yes the screen lowers quite but slow but who's in a rush? The natural colors come out nice and vivid. Absolutely no wrinkles in the screen like the other reviewers mentioned. I did a customized floating mount due to my recessed wall on one side & the screen looks like its floating on air (pics to follow). Love my new screening room.
customer_reviews.author: Troubleshooter. PH reviewer. Solid Straight No BS

customer_reviews.title: Projector Screen beats more expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is the best you can buy. I remember big name brands selling the same for thousands. It is mated to an Epson Cinema 5040ub projector. The ISF tech who calibrated the projector said the result is better than the very expensive Sony 4k projector he worked on earlier. He said the Sony is darker and the Epson brighter.
customer_reviews.author: ENJOYING LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Easy peesy
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling/ wall brackets super easy to install. Just clips in. See the video for the roll-down speed. Covering a 70" t.v..
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with this screen. I waited a while to get it just to find out that it was defective. The screen was unbalanced causing the picture to appear lopsided. It also was VERY loud when letting it up or down. I ended up sending it back for a refund and sticking to my old screen.
customer_reviews.author: Msshayna41

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, can't see the weave pattern, does not filter sound, motor not too loud, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Look
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this screen it provides the quality that I wanted the durability that I wanted and the look that I wanted from my projector.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable Screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simply, this screen is acceptable for the price. Mine has does have waves that only I seem to notice, versus my wife and guests. They are most prominent during pans and on rolling text. I'm not a purist but I believe this screen is a good jumping off point for home theaters and would probably like to upgrade sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: High quality screen, good light rejection
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good screen. No issues with the screen itself, however the mounting hardware sent with screen was incorrect. The screw diameter was too small for the anchors provided. I had to buy a different anchor, as the screws could not be tightened with anchor provided. Mounting bracket allows easy hanging of screen and locks securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great scrren at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: We have the 150 inch diagonal motorized screen. This is a great product for a reasonable price. It is easy to install (although heavy to hold during the process). The matte white screen provides excellent picture quality. This is the second one we have purchased. The first one stayed in a house we sold (at the buyers request). We were so happy with the screen, we bought the same model for the newer house.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E. Cuipa

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Electric Screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this screen to replace a manual one (ended up not working upon arrival) that we purchased. This is a great bang for your buck. Only a couple of comments: - Screen moves incredibly slowly - There's no way to tell it where it should stop (that I'm aware of). For our application, it is hanging below a soffit and, when fully extended, is too low for our projected image (conference room). It would be nice to be able to stop it at a certain point.
customer_reviews.author: M. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen for the money! It hangs very nice with no noticeable waves. The only down side for some people is the lack of remote control. This screen is controlled with a rocker switch that you have to turn on and off. No big deal for me but for some it may matter.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang, remote is amazing super easy to control and great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Z&A Bodenstab

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, no issues thus far.
customer_reviews.text: I have waited for a while to order this screen. The screen is very good and I have no complaints on the operation of it. The motor sound is very minimal. For 3 days I left the screen down, to take care of the initial wrinkles. I am no longer seeing it now. I have to buy the 6inch L-bracket as I have to mount against the wall covering the window. excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Siva Tumuluru

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Owned a year, and randomly the screen clicks but wont scroll down or retract. Works intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good screen, but with its flaws
customer_reviews.text: Good screen, but has two flaws: 1) does not include any remote capability as advertised, and you have to buy a $160 kit to get that. Not even a RJ-45 port to run a cable to your projector unless you spend 35% of the value of the screen. Having a cord coming out of the screen is just ugly. Similar priced screens include this. 2) there is no way to adjust the black drop top without voiding the warranty; there is a 12" gap at the top which is way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Business User

customer_reviews.title: The installation is so much easier than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I called an electrician to have this professionally installed before even taking it out of the box, and that was a mistake. You can easily do this yourself! Each end has 2 hook like holes, all you need is two screws in the wall and you can just hang it. It even includes a ruler with the thing to make sure it's level in it. I was embarrassed I called an electrician it was so simple for him to do. With that said, the screen looks great, it's quiet, and I love it. VERY happy with my choice on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Namey

customer_reviews.title: Its like having our own little movie theater in the house.
customer_reviews.text: This screen works great. The remote up and down feature is perfect. We decided to do a large projection set up as opposed to getting a huge flat screen. With this screen and the projector we spent less than $1000 bucks. The quality is perfect with our HD cable service. We love watching the Bruins games and we love having family movie night. Its like having our own little movie theater in the house.
customer_reviews.author: FlanNH

product_meta.title: Elite Screens Spectrum Electric Motorized Projector Screen with Multi Aspect Ratio Function Max Size 100-inch Diag 16:9 to 95-inch Diag 2.35:1, Home Theater 8K/4K Ultra HD Ready Projection, ELECTRIC100H
product_meta.description: Style:Spectrum| Size:100" Diagonal, 16:9| Color:White/BlackElite Screens Spectrum series is the absolute solution for anyone who is looking for a high quality electric projection screen at a budget friendly price Elite Screens Spectrum series features include Durable casing that easily installs to your wall or ceiling Includes install kit Includes infrared (IR) remote detachable 3-way wall switch and 12V trigger cable 2-Year Manufactures and Lifetime Product Support by Elite Screens a ISO9001 manufacturer since 2004 Elite Screens Spectrum series includes Elite Screens' MaxWhite 2 FRONT projection screen material which features 180° Wide Viewing Angle 1 1 gain Active 3D 4K Ultra HD and HDR ready! Black masking borders enhance picture contrast Black Backed to Prevent Light Penetration/Loss Elite Screens is focused on providing the best quality products at affordable prices while offering exceptional service Since 2004 Elite Screens has become a global leader in projection screen manufacturing through its headquarters in the US and branch offices in Europe Japan Australia India Taiwan and China With a focus on superior product and service Elite Screens is dedicated to making projection screens for any projection environment Ask about Elite’s 2-year and 3-year ENR-G enhanced
feature_bullets: SIZE: 100-inch Diagonal, 16: 9 Aspect Ratio. View Size: 49. 2" H x 87. 2" W. Overall Size: 66" H x 101. 2" W. Black Case.

MATERIAL: MaxWhite 2, 1. 1 Gain, 4K Ultra HD and Active 3D Ready FRONT Projection Screen with Black Backing. Features a 180° viewing angle is Mildew Resistant, Easy to Clean. Compatible with Standard UHD/HD projectors. Not compatible w/ Ultra/Short Throw Projectors.Do not wipe in circular motion
CERTIFICATION: GREEN GUARD and GREENGUARD GOLD Certified for Safe/Clean Indoor Use. The ISF Certified material is a testament to its ability for image fidelity in a dark room environment.
EASY TO INSTALL: Ships fully assembled, plug and play ready, features a durable casing that easily installs to your wall or ceiling with the included installation kit.
INCLUDES: Infrared (IR) Remote, Detachable 3-Way Wall Switch, and 12V Trigger Cable.

WARRANTY & SERVICE: 2-Year / 3-Year ENR-G, Manufactures by Elite Screens' an ISO9001 manufacturer since 2004 and Lifetime Tech Support by Email, Web Chat or Toll-Free Phone Call by Elite's Professional Service Team.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,175 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Department: HOME THEATRE ACCESS -> HOME THEATER ELECTRONICS
